plot: The Mexican Prairie Dog is a charismatic rodent that only lives in Mexico's desert. His role in the environment is very important, but sadly nowadays this species is critically endangered. Their survival depends on us.
title: Cynomys
plot_es: The Mexican Prairie Dog is a charismatic rodent that only lives in Mexico's desert. His role in the environment is very important, but sadly nowadays this species is critically endangered. Their survival depends on us.
